### Question 2

```{r}
summary(df)
```

### Question 3
```{r}
p <- ggplot(data = df,
            aes(x = square_footage, y = rental_rate))
p + geom_point(col = "#6E0000") +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", col = "black") +
  theme_bw() +
  scale_x_continuous("square footage") +
  scale_y_continuous("rental rate")
```

### Question 4

```{r}
lm_df <- lm(rental_rate ~ ., data = df)
summary(lm_df)
```
